channel.title: booking platform on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in booking platform on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Dayuse.com Logo
Dayuse.com is a booking platform for microstays based in Paris, with offices in Hong Kong and New York. Created in 2010, Dayuse.com is a website that offers the booking of daytime hotel rooms online and by telephone. The company lists over 7,000 hotels in 25 countries. The company is not a direct provider of these services, but an intermediary that connects customers with the hotels of their choice. In 2015, the daytime hotel booking platform Dayuse.
You can download theDayuselogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Dayuse
item.description: Dayuse.com is a booking platform for microstays based in Paris, with offices in Hong Kong and New York. Created in 2010, Dayuse.com is a website that offers the booking of daytime hotel rooms online and by telephone. The company lists over 7,000 hotels in 25 countries. The company is not a direct provider of these services, but an intermediary that connects customers with the hotels of their choice. In 2015, the daytime hotel booking platform Dayuse.
